entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 23. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 21.
